title: The Alton Gift; Marion Zimmer Bradley, Deborah J Ross
description: This is the Alton Gift and The Children of Kings by Deborah J Ross and Marion Zimmer Bradley (RIP).  A great addition to the Darkover series I couldn't seem to find these anywhere and had to go through infected sites to find suitable copies.  I hope you enjoy this book as much as I have enjoyed Bradley for many years. Sorry if the upload is slow I've scanned it and it seems to be perfectly safe and readable.  I included the .epub and .mobi to make it more convenient but if you need another format I recomend E-Callibre a wonderful free tool for converting and managing your Ebooks.  I sincerely hope this torrent helps someone and please seed after downloading.
